title: Detect and surface model drift signals from market-condition changes

sections.text: Implement drift monitoring for key Sales_Accelerator models (forecasting, best-next-action, risk alerts) using feature distribution + prediction/label stability checks. Add configurable alerts when drift crosses thresholds, with context on likely drivers (e.g., pricing changes, competitor mentions, packaging updates) and affected segments. Expose the drift status via an internal endpoint/logs to unblock follow-on recalibration work.
